      • getBytes

        public byte[] getBytes​(EscPosImage image)
        Bit Image commands Assembly into ESC/POS bytes.

        Select justification

        ASCII ESC a n

        function 112 Store the graphics data in the print buffer

        GS(L pL pH m fn a bx by c xL xH yL yH d1...dk

        function 050 Prints the buffered graphics data

        GS ( L pL pH m fn

        Specified by:
        getBytes in interface ImageWrapperInterface
        Parameters:
        image - to be printed
        Returns:
        bytes of ESC/POS
        See Also:
        EscPosImage.getRasterBytes(), EscPosImage.getRasterSizeInBytes()
